rules.name: Verifier_le_Statut_de_opportunite_validee_commerce_false
rules.label: Vérifier le Statut de l'opportunité ( validée commerce = false )

rules.name: PIES_Verifier_Statut_opportunite_validee_commerce_false
rules.label: PIES Vérifier le Statut de l'opportunité ( validée commerce = false )

rules.name: PITA_Verifier_le_Statut_de_lopportunite_validee_commerce_false
rules.label: PITA Vérifier le Statut de l'opportunité ( validée commerce = false )

rules.name: Verifier_Statut_opportunite_validee_commerce_true
rules.label: Vérifier le Statut de l'opportunité ( validée commerce = true )

rules.name: PIES_Verifier_le_Statut_opportunite_validee_commerce_true
rules.label: PIES Vérifier le Statut de l'opportunité ( validée commerce = true )

rules.name: Opportunit_passe_statut_6_Contrat_Signe
rules.label: L'opportunité passe au statut 6 - Contrat Signé

rules.name: Notification_Opp_Meuble
rules.conditionLogic: ( 1 OR 2 OR ( 3 AND 4 ) ) AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Notification Opp Meuble

rules.name: Passage_Statut_6_Pays_Region_PIES
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND ( 2 OR 3 ) AND ( 4 OR 5 OR ( 6 AND 7) ) AND ( 8 OR 9 )
rules.label: Passage Statut 6 : Pays/Région <> PIES

rules.name: Refusee_Commerce_Pays_Region_PIES
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND ( 2 OR 8 ) AND 3 AND ( 4 OR 5 OR ( 6 AND 7 ) )
rules.label: Refusée Commerce : Pays/Région <> PIES
